text: Duck Amuck is an American animated surreal comedy short movie. Released on September 15, 1965, Duck Amuck was directed by Charles M. Jones and written by Michael Maltese. Warner Brothers released Duck Amuck as part of the Merrie Melodies series (part of the Looney Tunes franchise). The movie stars Bugs Bunny (voiced by Mel Blanc) and Daffy Duck (voiced by Ben Washam, who was not listed in the movie's credits). == References == Category:1965 comedy movies
title: Duck Amuck
